titles.title: SF118 Tell me who made all of creation,

comments.comment: The refrain is sung twice after verses 1 and 3.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tell me who made all of creation,
who designed the wonders of nature?
Whose idea was pattern and colour,
wonderful to see?
Everywhere around me,
I can see the hand of God,
the evidence surrounds me,
in the greatness of his world.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tell me who made music and laughter,
who designed our bodies to start with?
Whose idea was thinking and feeling,
who gave life to me?
Refrain

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Don't stop looking, don't stop believing,
God is to be found when you seek him.
All creation tells of his glory,
for eternity.
Refrain
Everywhere around me!
